basics.name: Dustin Weaver
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Competent and resourceful application architect with a focus on code quality. Dedicated to using best coding practices, test driven development, and implementation of emerging tools of the trade. Advanced knowledge of Javascript libraries and frameworks such as jQuery, ReactJS, and Angular. Over 8 years professional experience working on the LAMP stack. Closely involved with clients and product owners to develop full featured enterprise applications and public facing websites within the agile methodology. I am fluent in English and Spanish.

work.summary: Lead development of new UI/UX features
highlights: Implementation of security measures and speed optimizations on user facing applications.

work.summary: Hands on team management within the software engineering dept
highlights: Development of a software development live cycle to be put into practice by team
Improvement in performance of ads with regards to page load time having a directly positive effect on revenue

work.summary: Project lead on many revenue producing application
highlights: Resolved many long standing issues that had persisted for years/months before my hiring

awards.title: Top Performer of the Year
awards.summary: Awarded for my achievements in providing solutions to technical problems facing the company
